languages.text: {n}Рослая девушка выступает вперед, и ропот офицеров стихает, но вы все равно не слышите звука ее шагов. Приглушенный свет {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люменов{/g} играет тенями на маске, скрывающей ее лицо.{/n} "Неумирающий Император велел нам сплетать кровавую паутину вокруг чад Его, и мы сплетали. Мы здесь, чтобы плести ее впредь". {n}Трагический шепот доносится из-под масок культистов: "Плести... впредь".{/n}

{n}They fall silent as a tall young woman steps forward. She moves toward you soundlessly, the dim light casting shadows across the mask which conceals her face.{/n} "The Undying Emperor commanded us to spin a web of blood around His children, and we obeyed. We obey still." {n}The masked cultists repeat the words in a mournful whisper, "We obey still."{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Рослая девушка выступает вперед, и ропот офицеров стихает, но вы все равно не слышите звука ее шагов. Приглушенный свет {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люменов{/g} играет тенями на маске, скрывающей ее лицо.{/n} "Неумирающий Император велел нам сплетать кровавую паутину вокруг чад Его, и мы сплетали. Мы здесь, чтобы плести ее впредь". {n}Трагический шепот доносится из-под масок культистов: "Плести... впредь".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A tall young woman steps forward and the officers' murmur dies down, but you still can't hear the sound of her footsteps. The subdued light of lumens creates an interplay of shadows upon the mask concealing her face.{/n} "The Undying Emperor commanded us to weave a bloodspun web around His children, and we have woven it. We are here to carry on weaving." {n}A tragic whisper comes from behind the cultists' masks. "Carry on... weaving."{/n}

{n}A tall young woman steps forward and the officers' murmur dies down, but you still can't hear the sound of her footsteps. The subdued light of lumens creates an interplay of shadows upon the mask concealing her face.{/n} "The Undying Emperor commanded us to weave a bloodspun web around His children, and we have woven it. We are here to carry on weaving." {n}A tragic whisper comes from behind the cultists' masks. "Carry on... weaving."{/n}

We obey still." {n}The masked cultists repeat the words in a mournful whisper, "We obey still."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les voix font silence au moment où une grande jeune femme s'avance vers vous sans bruit. La lumière tamisée projette des ombres sur le masque qui dissimule son visage.{/n} « L'Empereur Immortel nous a ordonné de tisser une toile de sang autour de Ses enfants, et nous avons obéi. Nous obéissons encore. » {n}Les cultistes masqués répètent dans un murmure lugubre : « Nous obéissons encore. »{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}They fall silent as a tall young woman steps forward. She moves toward you soundlessly, the dim light casting shadows across the mask which conceals her face.{/n} "The Undying Emperor commanded us to spin a web of blood around His children, and we obeyed. We obey still." {n}The masked cultists repeat the words in a mournful whisper, "We obey still."{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les voix font silence au moment où une grande jeune femme s'avance vers vous sans bruit. La lumière tamisée projette des ombres sur le masque qui dissimule son visage.{/n} « L'Empereur Immortel nous a ordonné de tisser une toile de sang autour de Ses enfants, et nous avons obéi. Nous obéissons encore. » {n}Les cultistes masqués répètent dans un murmure lugubre : « Nous obéissons encore. »{/n}

{n}Les voix font silence au moment où une grande jeune femme s'avance vers vous sans bruit. La lumière tamisée projette des ombres sur le masque qui dissimule son visage.{/n} « L'Empereur Immortel nous a ordonné de tisser une toile de sang autour de Ses enfants, et nous avons obéi. Nous obéissons encore. » {n}Les cultistes masqués répètent dans un murmure lugubre : « Nous obéissons encore. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}Todos se quedan en silencio cuando una mujer joven y alta se adelanta. Avanza hacia ti sin emitir el menor sonido, y la luz tenue crea sombras en la máscara que oculta su rostro.{/n} «El Emperador Inmortal nos ordenó tejer una red de sangre en torno a Sus hijos, y nosotros obedecimos. Aún seguimos obedeciendo». {n}Los cultistas enmascarados repiten sus palabras en un susurro apenado: «Aún seguimos obedeciendo».{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}They fall silent as a tall young woman steps forward. She moves toward you soundlessly, the dim light casting shadows across the mask which conceals her face.{/n} "The Undying Emperor commanded us to spin a web of blood around His children, and we obeyed. We obey still." {n}The masked cultists repeat the words in a mournful whisper, "We obey still."{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}

Avanza hacia ti sin emitir el menor sonido, y la luz tenue crea sombras en la máscara que oculta su rostro.{/n} «El Emperador Inmortal nos ordenó tejer una red de sangre en torno a Sus hijos, y nosotros obedecimos. Aún seguimos obedeciendo». {n}Los cultistas enmascarados repiten sus palabras en un susurro apenado: «Aún seguimos obedeciendo».{/n}

{n}Todos se quedan en silencio cuando una mujer joven y alta se adelanta. Avanza hacia ti sin emitir el menor sonido, y la luz tenue crea sombras en la máscara que oculta su rostro.{/n} «El Emperador Inmortal nos ordenó tejer una red de sangre en torno a Sus hijos, y nosotros obedecimos. Aún seguimos obedeciendo». {n}Los cultistas enmascarados repiten sus palabras en un susurro apenado: «Aún seguimos obedeciendo».{/n}

languages.text: {n}一位身材高挑的年轻女子走了过来，所有人都陷入了沉默。她悄无声息地向你走来，昏暗的灯光在她的面具上投下了阴影。{/n}“不死帝皇命令我们在祂的子民身边编织鲜血的罗网，我们服从了祂的命令。我们仍愿服从。”{n}所有戴着面具的教派信徒以哀伤的声音轻声重复着这句话：“我们仍愿服从。”{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}They fall silent as a tall young woman steps forward. She moves toward you soundlessly, the dim light casting shadows across the mask which conceals her face.{/n} "The Undying Emperor commanded us to spin a web of blood around His children, and we obeyed. We obey still." {n}The masked cultists repeat the words in a mournful whisper, "We obey still."{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}一位身材高挑的年轻女子走了过来，所有人都陷入了沉默。她悄无声息地向你走来，昏暗的灯光在她的面具上投下了阴影。{/n}“不死帝皇命令我们在祂的子民身边编织鲜血的罗网，我们服从了祂的命令。我们仍愿服从。”{n}所有戴着面具的教派信徒以哀伤的声音轻声重复着这句话：“我们仍愿服从。”{/n}
{n}一位身材高挑的年轻女子走了过来，所有人都陷入了沉默。她悄无声息地向你走来，昏暗的灯光在她的面具上投下了阴影。{/n}“不死帝皇命令我们在祂的子民身边编织鲜血的罗网，我们服从了祂的命令。我们仍愿服从。”{n}所有戴着面具的教派信徒以哀伤的声音轻声重复着这句话：“我们仍愿服从。”{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}

languages.text: {n}若い女性が前に出てくると、彼らは静かになった。彼女は音を立てずにあなたに向かってやってきてた。鈍い光が彼女の顔を隠している仮面に、影を作った。{/n}「不滅の皇帝は、ご自身の子供たちに血の網を紡ぐよう命じられ、我々はそれに従った。我々は今も従っている」{n}仮面をかぶった魔女団の者たちは、悲痛なささやき声でその言葉を繰り返した。「今も従っている」{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}They fall silent as a tall young woman steps forward. She moves toward you soundlessly, the dim light casting shadows across the mask which conceals her face.{/n} "The Undying Emperor commanded us to spin a web of blood around His children, and we obeyed. We obey still." {n}The masked cultists repeat the words in a mournful whisper, "We obey still."{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}

languages.text: {n}Sie verstummen, als eine große junge Frau vortritt. Sie bewegt sich geräuschlos auf dich zu. Das schwache Licht wirft Schatten über die Maske, die ihr Gesicht verbirgt.{/n} "Der Todlose Imperator hat uns befohlen, ein Netz aus Blut um seine Kinder zu spinnen, und wir haben gehorcht. Wir gehorchen noch immer." {n}Die maskierten Kultisten wiederholen die Worte in einem feierlichen Flüsterton. "Wir gehorchen noch immer."{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}They fall silent as a tall young woman steps forward. She moves toward you soundlessly, the dim light casting shadows across the mask which conceals her face.{/n} "The Undying Emperor commanded us to spin a web of blood around His children, and we obeyed. We obey still." {n}The masked cultists repeat the words in a mournful whisper, "We obey still."{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}

languages.text: {n}Uzun boylu ve genç bir kadın öne çıkınca herkes sessizliğe bürünüyor. Kadın, çıt çıkarmadan sana yaklaşıyor. Loş ışıkta kadının yüzünü saklayan maskenin üzerine gölge düşüyor.{/n} "Ölmeyen İmparator, bize O'nun evlatlarının çevresine kandan bir ağ örmemizi emretti. Biz de itaat ettik. Hâlâ da itaat ediyoruz." {n}Maskeli tarikatçılar, hüzünle fısıldayarak son söylenenleri tekrar ediyor: "Hâlâ da itaat ediyoruz."{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}They fall silent as a tall young woman steps forward. She moves toward you soundlessly, the dim light casting shadows across the mask which conceals her face.{/n} "The Undying Emperor commanded us to spin a web of blood around His children, and we obeyed. We obey still." {n}The masked cultists repeat the words in a mournful whisper, "We obey still."{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}
